thread.title: Syrian Observatory: 71 dead in eastern Ghouta in past day

title: Syrian Observatory: 71 dead in eastern Ghouta in past day

organizations.name: syrian observatory for human rights monitoring group

text: February 19, 2018 / 2:55 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago Syrian Observatory: 71 dead in eastern Ghouta in past day Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BEIRUT (Reuters) - Syrian government air strikes and artillery killed 71 people in the eastern Ghouta pocket near Damascus over the past 24 hours, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group said on Monday. The Britain-based group said bombardment of the insurgent-held enclave started escalating on Sunday evening, wounding 325 people. There was no immediate comment from the Syrian military. Reporting by Ellen Francis; Editing by Peter Graff
